roleset.name: determine ahead of time
roleset.note: PREDETERMINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'predetermine' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from predetermine.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: always passive
example.text: But what about those of us whose views [*T*-2]-1 are not predetermined [*-1]by formula or ideology?
